issue.title: Errors on build (production) for languages that I do not support.
issue.body:
<!--
Before you submit an issue we recommend you visit [docs](https://www.i18next.com/) or [docs](https://react.i18next.com/) or [docs](https://github.com/i18next/next-i18next) or [StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=i18next) or similar and ask any questions you have or mention any problems you've had getting started with i18next.

**Please read this entire template before posting any issue. If you ignore these instructions and post an issue here that does not follow the instructions, your issue might be closed, locked.**
-->

## 🐛 Bug Report

Errors on build (production) for languages that I do not support.

## To Reproduce

I have used the following example to get started with react-i18next: https://github.com/i18next/react-i18next/tree/master/example/react

I changed the `en` and `de` languages to `ro-RO` and `en-GB`. I only need these two languages in my application.

While in development mode, everything is ok, but when I build my app and run it in production mode, I get errors for languages that I do not want, for example, `en`, `ro`, or `en-US`.

Example of errors:
```
request.js:44          GET http://localhost:3002/locales/ro/translation.json 404 (Not Found)

request.js:44          GET http://localhost:3002/locales/en/translation.json 404 (Not Found)

request.js:44          GET http://localhost:3002/locales/en-US/translation.json 404 (Not Found)
```

## Expected behavior

I only want my i18n to run for `ro-RO` and `en-GB`, in both production and development.

## Your Environment

- *runtime version*: node v16.16.0 LTS
- *i18next version*: 22.0.4
- *os*: Mac

```
    "i18next": "22.0.4",
    "i18next-browser-languagedetector": "7.0.1",
    "i18next-http-backend": "2.0.1",
    "react-scripts": "5.0.1",
    "serve": "14.0.1",
```

comment.body: Seem this fixed the issue. Thank you, and sorry for the unnecessary issue.

comment.body: I'll give it a try with removing `fallbackLng: "en-GB",` and adding `supportedLngs: ['ro-RO', 'en-GB']`.

- *os*: Mac

```
    "i18next": "22.0.4",
    "i18next-browser-languagedetector": "7.0.1",
    "i18next-http-backend": "2.0.1",
    "react-scripts": "5.0.1",
    "serve": "14.0.1",
```

comment.body: I'll give it a try with removing `fallbackLng: "en-GB",` and adding `supportedLngs: ['ro-RO', 'en-GB']`.

issue.title: Errors on build (production) for languages that I do not support.
issue.body:
<!--
Before you submit an issue we recommend you visit [docs](https://www.i18next.com/) or [docs](https://react.i18next.com/) or [docs](https://github.com/i18next/next-i18next) or [StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=i18next) or similar and ask any questions you have or mention any problems you've had getting started with i18next.

**Please read this entire template before posting any issue. If you ignore these instructions and post an issue here that does not follow the instructions, your issue might be closed, locked.**
-->

## 🐛 Bug Report

Errors on build (production) for languages that I do not support.

## To Reproduce

I have used the following example to get started with react-i18next: https://github.com/i18next/react-i18next/tree/master/example/react

I changed the `en` and `de` languages to `ro-RO` and `en-GB`. I only need these two languages in my application.

While in development mode, everything is ok, but when I build my app and run it in production mode, I get errors for languages that I do not want, for example, `en`, `ro`, or `en-US`.

Example of errors:
```
request.js:44          GET http://localhost:3002/locales/ro/translation.json 404 (Not Found)

request.js:44          GET http://localhost:3002/locales/en/translation.json 404 (Not Found)

request.js:44          GET http://localhost:3002/locales/en-US/translation.json 404 (Not Found)
```

## Expected behavior

I only want my i18n to run for `ro-RO` and `en-GB`, in both production and development.

## Your Environment

- *runtime version*: node v16.16.0 LTS
- *i18next version*: 22.0.4
- *os*: Mac

```
    "i18next": "22.0.4",
    "i18next-browser-languagedetector": "7.0.1",
    "i18next-http-backend": "2.0.1",
    "react-scripts": "5.0.1",
    "serve": "14.0.1",
```
